properties.accessibility: Wheelchair access, one floor, accessible toilets, accessible parking. Please see our website https://middletonelderlyaid.org.uk/
properties.description: Free hot drinks, refreshments and sandwiches. Wi-Fi, device recharging, books and games available as well as lunch clubs, exercise classes and activities all free of charge. Please also see our website https://middletonelderlyaid.org.uk/

properties.accessibility: Fully wheelchair accessible. Accessible toilets and parking on site
properties.description: Our warm spaces offer is within the 'Pippins' cafe area of Amblers Orchard Community Wellbeing (extra care) service. Free hot drinks and wi-fi and comfortable setting with company is available.
properties.title: Amblers Orchard

properties.accessibility:
Disabled parking is available adjacent to the entrance.
The Warm Space area is not fully wheelchair accessible. Ground floor and first floor toilets are not fully accessible. No lift is available.
Please ring to discuss requirements.

properties.description:

biscuits/snacks
phone charging crafts
board games a warm welcome and chat We also have a low cost pantry for those seeking cheap food items.

properties.accessibility: Yes wheelchair accessible and lift available. And accessible toilets. Parking available on site.
